Associate Professor of Physics<br />
Duquesne University

Experimental atomic physics research at [Duquesne University](http://www.duq.edu) and [Pittsburgh Quantum Institute](http://www.pqi.org).

[Research](./research.qmd) interests include ultracold atoms, related optics, chemical spectroscopy, environmental hazards.

[Teaching](./teaching.qmd) interests include undergraduate physics, especially upper division courses.

[More info](./about.qmd) about where to find me online.
